name: One More Arm
description:
This is my Ludum Dare 41 entry for the theme "Combine 2 uncompatible genres".

So I’ve decided to combine a slot machine and an arcade platformer and the result is here. The whole game takes place on one screen and changes between classic one-armed-bandit and an arcade plaformer which are connected with each other. The controls are described in the game, use Escape to exit.

I hope you have some fun with it.(oh god, I hope I didnt miss any gamebreaking bugs)

Music in-game: HateBit feat. BUHNEM CREW - FWD_FWD_FWD_100000TIMES
